channel.title: [PI] Points for completing a Slayer Task
channel.description:
I was wondering how to give a certain amount of points for completing a slayer task depending on the difficulty of the task. Alot of other PI servers have this.
5 - easy 10 - medium 15 - hard
[b]Anything helps just comment bellow please.[/b]
Also I already have followed Tutorial's guide on how to do this but his method only gives you one variable per task that is not effected by difficulty. I am not looking for that -> dont repost it!
